     .kelvin0 {
        position: absolute;
        z-index: -99999999;
        width: 0;
        height: 0;
        padding: 0;
        margin: -1px;
        overflow: hidden;
        clip: rect(0,0,0,0);
        border: 0;
    }
<aside id="ac-gn-segmentbar" class="ac-gn-segmentbar" lang="en-US" dir="ltr" data-strings="{ 'exit': 'Exit', 'view': '{%STOREFRONT%} Store Home', 'segments': { 'smb': 'Business Store Home', 'eduInd': 'Education Store Home', 'other': 'Store Home' } }"></aside> <input type="checkbox" id="ac-gn-menustate" class="ac-gn-menustate" />
<nav id="ac-globalnav" class="no-js" role="navigation" aria-label="Global Navigation" data-hires="false" data-analytics-region="global nav" lang="en-US" dir="ltr" data-store-locale="us" data-store-api="//www.apple.com/[storefront]/shop/bag/status" data-search-locale="en_US" data-search-api="//www.apple.com/search-services/suggestions/">

  <div id="aidSignin" class="aid-signin">
    <div class="flow-body signin clearfix" role="main">
        <div class="container">
            <div class="flex home-content">
                <h2 class="title separator your-account">Your account foreverythingApple.</h2>
                <div class="intro-signin">A single AppleID and password gives you access to all Apple services.</div>
                <div class="intro-signin">
                    
                    <a class="button link faq-link" href="/faq" title="Learn more about Apple ID">
                        Learn more about AppleID<i class="icon icon_right_chevron"></i>
                    </a>
                </div>
                
                <div class="apps text-center">
                    {{#is deviceRatio 1}}
                        <div class="app-icons-1x" title="Apple Apps and Services: iCloud, App Store, iTunes, iBooks, Messages, FaceTime, Apple Store, Game Center."></div>
                    {{else}}
                        <div class="app-icons-2x" title="Apple Apps and Services: iCloud, App Store, iTunes, iBooks, Messages, FaceTime, Apple Store, Game Center."></div>
                    {{/is}}
                </div>
                <div class="mobile-apps text-center mobile-only">
                    {{#is deviceRatio 1}}
                        <div class="mobile-icons-1x" title="Apple Apps and Services: iCloud, App Store, iTunes, iBooks, Messages, FaceTime, Apple Store, Game Center."></div>
                    {{else}}
                        <div class="mobile-icons-2x" title="Apple Apps and Services: iCloud, App Store, iTunes, iBooks, Messages, FaceTime, Apple Store, Game Center."></div>
                    {{/is}}
                </div>
                <div class="intro-signin create show">
                    
                    <a class="button link create-link" href="/account" title='Create your Apple ID'>Create your AppleID<i class="icon icon_right_chevron"></i></a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                    
                      
    
    
    
    
    
  <div class="flow-body faq clearfix" role="main">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="faq-item">
            <h6 class="question">What is an AppleID?</h6>
            <p class="answer">An AppleID is the personal account you use to access Apple services like the AppStore, iTunesStore, iCloud, iMessage, the AppleOnlineStore, FaceTime, and more. It includes the email address and password you use to sign in, as well as all the contact, payment, and security details that you&rsquo;ll use across Apple services.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="faq-item">
            <h6 class="question">When do I use my AppleID?</h6>
            <p class="answer">Any time you set up a new device, make a purchase, or use any Apple service, you will be asked to sign in with your AppleID and password. Once signed in you&rsquo;ll have access to the service and all the personal information in your account.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="faq-item">
            <h6 class="question">How many AppleIDs do I need?</h6>
            <p class="answer">Just one. Use the same AppleID everywhere you sign in to ensure that all your Apple services and devices work together seamlessly and you can access your personal content from all your devices.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="faq-item">
            <h6 class="question">Can I share an AppleID with someone else?</h6>
            <p class="answer">Your AppleID should not be shared with anyone else. It provides access to personal information including contacts, photos, device backups, and more. Sharing your AppleID with someone else means you are giving them access to all your personal content and may lead to confusion over who actually owns the account. To share iTunes & AppStore purchases, photos, a calendar, and more with someone else, try <a href="https://support.apple.com/HT201060" target="_blank" title="Family Sharing">Family Sharing</a>, <a href="https://support.apple.com/HT202786" target="_blank" title="iCloud Photo Sharing">iCloud Photo Sharing</a>, or other easy-to-use sharing features.</p>
        </div>
        <div class="faq-item">
            <h6 class="question">How can I keep my AppleID secure?</h6>
            <p class="answer">Security and privacy are very important to Apple and we provide a number of ways to secure your AppleID and protect your privacy including strong passwords, two-factor authentication, and more. Learn more about <a href="https://support.apple.com/HT201303" target="_blank" title="Apple ID and Security">security and your AppleID</a>.</p>
        </div>
        <p class="info">For more information or help, <a href="https://www.apple.com/support/appleid/" target="_blank" title="Apple Support">visit Apple Support</a>.</p>
    </div>
</div>
                    
                      
    
    
    
    
    
  <div class="idms-spinner"></div>

                        appContext: function () {
                            var context = '/';
                            return context.substring(0, context.length - 1);

                        spinOptions: {
                            lines: 13, // The number of lines to draw
                            length: 5, // The length of each line

                    };
                    var setWidgetConatinerHeight = function () {
                        var widgetContainer = document.getElementById(bootData.authInitOptions.containerId);
                        var widgetContainerHeight =  (document.documentElement.clientHeight - widgetContainer.offsetTop ) + 'px';
                        var widgetContainerStyle = widgetContainer.style;
                        document.body.scrollTop = 0;
                        widgetContainerStyle.height = widgetContainerHeight;
                        widgetContainerStyle.maxHeight = widgetContainerHeight;
                        return widgetContainerHeight;
                    };
                    var setUIForRepair = function (reset) {
                        var appContent = $('#app-content');
                        if (reset) {
                            $('#'+bootData.authInitOptions.containerId).attr('style', '');
                            $(appContent).show();
                            $('.footer').show();
                        }
                        else {
                            var height = setWidgetConatinerHeight();
                            $('#'+bootData.authInitOptions.containerId).css({'overflow':'hidden'});
                            $(appContent).hide();
                            $('.footer').hide();
                        }
                    };
                    if (!window.location.origin) {
                        window.location.origin = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.hostname + (window.location.port ? ':' + window.location.port : '');
                    }
                    var pattern = /^https?:\/\//i, logoUrl = "https://appleid.cdn-apple.com/static/bin/cb3205592551/dist/assets/images/appleid_i18n/aid_logo@2x.png"
;
                    if (!pattern.test(logoUrl)) {
                        if (!window.location.origin) {
                            window.location.origin = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.hostname + (window.location.port ? ':' + window.location.port: '');
                        }
                        logoUrl = window.location.origin + logoUrl;
                    }
                    bootData.authInitOptions = {
                        serviceKey: 'af1139274f266b22b68c2a3e7ad932cb3c0bbe854e13a79af78dcc73136882c3',
                        serviceURL: 'https://idmsa.apple.com/appleauth',

                        containerId: 'authWidgetContainer',
                        locale: 'en_US',

                            src: logoUrl,
                            width: '200px',
                            logoAltText : 'Apple ID'
                        },
                        theme: 'lite',
                        signInLabel: 'Manage your Apple account',
                        rememberMeLabel: 'remember-me',
                        features: {
                            rememberMe: true,
                            createLink: false,
                            iForgotLink: false
                        },
                        returnUrl: window.location.href,
                        callbacks: {
                            onAuthSuccess: function (opts) {
                                if (bootData.returnUrl && bootData.appId) {
                                    window.location.replace(bootData.returnUrl);
                                }
                                else {
                                    // TODO: Uncomment this when ajaxNormalize issue is resolved - Shri
                                    //$("#pagecontent").load('/account/manage?fragment=true');
                                    /*
                                    $.ajax({
                                        url: "/account/manage?fragment=true",
                                        headers: {
                                            Accept: "text/html",
                                            "Content-Type": "text/html"
                                        }
                                    }).done(function (data) {
                                        if(data.indexOf('DOCTYPE') > -1){
                                            //if it is a full page we probably got back the landing page because of a 302
                                            window.location.href = '/signout?timedOut';
                                        } else {
                                            $("#managedata").html(data);
                                        }
                                    });
                                    history.pushState(null, window.title, '/account/manage');
                                    */
                                    // window.location.replace('/account/manage');
                                    window.location.href = '/account/manage';
                                }
                            },
                            onAuthFailure: function () {
                            },
                            onAuthReady: function () {
                                // Remove the spinner
                            },
                            onPasswordAuthDone: function (isSuccess) {
                                // remove any notice banners
                                if($('.alert-close').length > 0){
                                  $('.alert-close').alert('close');
                                }
                                if (isSuccess) {
                                    // hide the iForgot link
                                    document.querySelector("#forgot-link").style.visibility = "hidden";
                                }
                            },
                            onAuthCancel: function () {
                                console.log('Auth cancelled.......');
                                document.querySelector("#forgot-link").style.visibility = "visible";
                                setUIForRepair(true);
                            },
                            onRepairStart: function () {
                                //Using Regex from detectmobilebrowsers.com:
                                var isMobileBrowser = function () {
                                    var check = false;
                                    (function (a) {
                                        if (/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|iris|kindle|lge )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(a.substr(0, 4)))check = true
                                    })(navigator.userAgent || navigator.vendor || window.opera);
                                    return check;
                                };
                                if (isMobileBrowser() && document.getElementById(bootData.authInitOptions.containerId)) {
                                    setUIForRepair();
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    };
                    window.AppleID.service.JSLogger.setSCNT(bootData.scnt);
                    exports('data', bootData);
                }
            };
        });
        System.import('idms/modules/managers/localizationManager')
          .then(function (module) {
            var locManager = module.default;
                            var locManager = module.default;
                locManager.addString('generic.error.title', 'An unknown error has occurred');
                locManager.addString('ok.button', 'OK');
                locManager.addString('server.error.message', 'Your request could not be completed because of an error. Try again later.');
                locManager.addString('appleid.invalid', 'Enter a valid email address to use as your Apple ID.');
                locManager.addString('appleid.sameAsAppleID', 'This email address is not available. Choose a different address.');
                locManager.addString('appleid.appleOwnedDomain', 'Your new AppleID cannot end in {{placeHolder.domain}}. Choose a different email address.', false);
                locManager.addString('captcha.empty', 'Enter the text in the image.');
                locManager.addString('password.confirm.mismatch', 'The passwords you entered do not match.');
                locManager.addString('password.confirm.empty', 'Confirm your password.');
                locManager.addString('password.atLeastOneNumber', 'At least one number');
                locManager.addString('password.consecutiveIdenticalChar', 'Too many consecutive identical characters.');
                locManager.addString('password.easilyGuessed', 'Password can be too easily guessed.');
                locManager.addString('password.eightChar', '8 or more characters');
                locManager.addString('password.moderate', 'moderate');
                locManager.addString('password.notAppleID', 'Password cannot be the same as AppleID.');
                locManager.addString('password.passwordStrength', 'Strength:');
                locManager.addString('password.strong', 'strong');
                locManager.addString('password.doNotMatch', 'The passwords you entered do not match.');
                locManager.addString('password.upperAndLowercase', 'Upper & lowercase letters');
                locManager.addString('password.usedOtherWebsite', 'Avoid using a password that you use with other websites or that might be easy for someone else to guess.');
                locManager.addString('password.usedPastYear', 'Choose a password you haven\'t used in the past year.');
                locManager.addString('password.weak', 'weak');
                locManager.addString('password.yourPasswordMustHaveColon', 'Your password must have:');
                locManager.addString('password.onlyDigits', 'Only numbers');
                locManager.addString('password.maxChars', 'numbers');
                locManager.addString('password.greaterThanThirtyTwoChars', 'Your password must be 32 characters or less.');
                locManager.addString('password.change.error.fallback', 'Cannot change password. Try again later.');
                locManager.addString('confirm-password-input.invalid', 'Confirm your password.');
                locManager.addString('confirm-password-input.doesnt_match', 'The passwords you entered do not match.');
                locManager.addString('currentPassword.empty', 'Enter your current password.');
                locManager.addString('phone.verification.error.maxcodes', 'You have sent too many codes to verify your phone number.');
                locManager.addString('phone.error.maxcodes.step1', 'Too many codes have already been sent to verify this phone number. Use a different number or try again later.');
                locManager.addString('phone.error.maxattempts', 'Too many failed attempts to verify this number have occurred. Use a different number or try again later.');
                locManager.addString('newPassword.matchCurrent', 'Your new password must be different than your current password.');
                locManager.addString('newPassword.mustBeDifferent', 'Your new and current passwords must be different.');
                locManager.addString('web.signin.main.forgot.text', 'Forgot Apple ID or password?');
                locManager.addString('title.signin', 'Manage your Apple ID');
                locManager.addString('title.create', 'Create Your AppleID');
                locManager.addString('title.faq', 'Apple ID FAQ - Apple (US)');
                locManager.addString('date.date_invalid', 'Enter a valid birthday.');
                locManager.addString('phone-input.phone_invalid', 'Please enter a valid phone number.');
                locManager.addString('phone-input.maxCharsLimit', 'Phone can\'t be longer than 32 digits');
                locManager.addString('email-input.name_invalid', 'Enter a valid email address to use as your Apple ID.');
                locManager.addString('first-name-input.name_invalid', 'Enter your first name.');
                locManager.addString('first-name-input.maxCharsLimit', 'First name must be 32 characters or less.');
                locManager.addString('middle-name-input.name_invalid', 'Your middle name cannot include special characters.');
                locManager.addString('middle-name-input.maxCharsLimit', 'Middle name must be 32 characters or less.');
                locManager.addString('last-name-input.name_invalid', 'Enter your last name.');
                locManager.addString('last-name-input.maxCharsLimit', 'Last name must be 32 characters or less.');
                locManager.addString('payment.cvv.invalid', 'This security code is not valid.');
                locManager.addString('timeout.title', 'Are you still there?');
                locManager.addString('timeout.errorMessageSingular', 'To protect your privacy, this session will time out in 1 second. If the session expires, you will need to start over.');
                locManager.addString('timeout.errorMessagePlural', 'To protect your privacy, this session will time out in {{duration}} seconds. If the session expires, you will need to start over.');
                locManager.addString('timeout.continueText', 'OK');
                locManager.addString('date.empty', 'Enter your birthday.');
                locManager.addString('date.date_invalid', 'Enter a valid birthday.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.no_question_selected', 'Select a question.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.empty', 'Enter an answer.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.not_question', 'The answer to your question cannot be the same as the question.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.min_char', 'Answers to security questions must be at least 3 characters.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.max_char', 'Answers to security questions must be less than 32 characters.');
                locManager.addString('security-answer.not_unique', 'You cannot use the same answer for multiple security questions.');
                locManager.addString('security-questions.securityQuestion1', 'Security Question 1');
                locManager.addString('security-questions.securityQuestion2', 'Security Question 2');
                locManager.addString('security-questions.securityQuestion3', 'Security Question 3');
                // verify-phone localized messages
                locManager.addString('verify-phone.smsLinkText', 'Resend Text');
                locManager.addString('verify-phone.smsSubText', 'Get a new verification code.');
                locManager.addString('verify-phone.phoneLinkText', 'Call Me');
                locManager.addString('verify-phone.phoneLinkSubText', 'Get a phone call with a code.');
                locManager.addString('error.request.could.not.complete', 'Your request could not be completed at this time.');
                locManager.addString('error.please.try.again.later', 'Please try again later.');
                locManager.addString('ok.button.label', 'OK');
                locManager.addString('aria.digit', 'Digit');
            return System.import('web/landing/app');
          })
          .catch(function (error) {
            window.AppleID.service.JSLogger.onerror(error);
          });
